body_html: @danishcontractor I agree that the bug is probably not related to training length. My guess is that each backward pass has a certain probability of randomly failing with this assert, so running for longer just increases the overall chances of encountering the bug.
body_text: @danishcontractor I agree that the bug is probably not related to training length. My guess is that each backward pass has a certain probability of randomly failing with this assert, so running for longer just increases the overall chances of encountering the bug.
body: @danishcontractor I agree that the bug is probably not related to training length. My guess is that each backward pass has a certain probability of randomly failing with this assert, so running for longer just increases the overall chances of encountering the bug.
